evidence.claim: Alegis uses AWS for their cloud infrastructure to host applications securely.
The company adheres to HIPAA regulations to protect patient data.
Alegis supports EDI X12 transaction sets which are crucial for healthcare billing and claims processing.
They implement FHIR standards for data interoperability between healthcare applications.

icp.icp_reason: Engaged with EDI X12 and HIPAA standards, indicating strong alignment with API-first healthcare data exchange needs.
matched_use_cases: X12 transaction sets for healthcare claims
EDI integration for eligibility and claims management
